column1: Some callers to a community hotline are worried that getting a positive coronavirus diagnosis could jeopardize their future in the U.S. Staff tell them: “If you’re not alive, you’re never going to get a green card.” More from @rebeccaplevin: https://www.desertsun.com/story/news/politics/immigration/2020/04/29/coronavirus-faq-answers-undocumented-residents/3025656001/ via @MyDesert
